divs: Sighting Detailsgirl friend seen bright light during daytime didnt tell me i noticed it at night and neighbor and i took pictures pictures came out shaped like a triangle from earth it looked like a cross with telescope it looked circle . watching it by tree tops as a station area to tell if it was moving and it would go out of sight and then come back the light would move at a slow than medium speed from earth it appeared to have two red lights on the cross ends but by scope they were not there the object looked round. 15 years ago i seen the same thing and reported it twice to the us coast guard i didnt know anyone else to report to because i didnt want people thing iam crazy but this time my girl friend susan and my neighbor steve that took the pictures seen the object so i have wittnesses .we were at home outside the bright light attracted me seen other stars around it the direction was west seen object 15 years ago i knew what it was lost sight because we went to bed object was seen may 4 5 and were waiting to see if we see it tonight may 6.
Summary: Bright light moving around looked like cross from earth and round by telescope clear night seen for 2 nights working on 3.
